video_prompt: Young woman's head tilts, her gaze tracking a fluttering white butterfly as it gently hovers. Subtle orange light shifts across her face, highlighting a blush. A vine-like bracelet subtly moves.
image_prompt: Anime aesthetic, young woman with black and blonde hair and blue eyes looking up at a white butterfly. Warm, dreamlike pinkish-orange background, soft lighting. She wears a grey V-neck top with a green vine bracelet. Subtle blush from sunset/sunrise glow.
refined_video_prompt: Head gradually tilts, eyes tracking a gently fluttering, hovering form. Warm light subtly transitions across features, revealing an intensifying blush. A wrist's adornment delicately shifts.
